00024 // Function: LineContentAssistWidget()
00025 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 LineContentAssistWidget::LineContentAssistWidget(QLineEdit* parent,
00027                                          QSharedPointer<ILineContentMatcher> matcher) :
00028     QListWidget(parent), m_maxVisibleItems(DEFAULT_MAX_VISIBLE_ITEMS),
00029     m_lastAssistStartPos(-1), m_contentFound(false)
00030 {
00031     Q_ASSERT(parent != 0);
00032     Q_ASSERT(matcher != 0);
00033     m_parent = parent;
00034     m_matcher = matcher;
00035 
00036     // Set widget settings.
00037     setWindowFlags(Qt::Tool | Qt::FramelessWindowHint | Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint | Qt::X11BypassWindowManagerHint);
00038     setFrameShadow(QFrame::Raised);
00039     setFocusPolicy(Qt::NoFocus);
00040     setFont(QFont("Tahoma", 10));
00041 
00042     // We want the widget to look active even though it is inactive.
00043     QPalette pal = palette();
00044     pal.setColor(QPalette::Inactive, QPalette::Highlight, Qt::darkBlue);
00045     pal.setColor(QPalette::Inactive, QPalette::HighlightedText, Qt::white);
00046     setPalette(pal);
00047 }

00056 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 // Function: handleKey()
00058 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 bool LineContentAssistWidget::tryHandleKey(QKeyEvent* e)
00060 {
00061     if (e->key() == Qt::Key_Space && e->modifiers() == Qt::CTRL)
00062     {
00063         updateAssist(0);
00064         return true;
00065     }
00066 
00067     QString text = m_parent->text().left(m_parent->cursorPosition()) + e->text();
00068 
00069     // Check if we can commit.
00070     if (m_contentFound && (e->key() == Qt::Key_Return || e->key() == Qt::Key_Tab ||
00071                            (canCommitWith(e) && !m_matcher->lookForwardMatch(text))))
00072     {
00073         // Commit the selection.
00074         commitSelection();
00075 
00076         // If the key is a character, let the editor handle it too.
00077         if (e->key() != Qt::Key_Return && e->key() != Qt::Key_Tab)
00078         {
00079             return false;
00080         }
00081 
00082         // Otherwise we're fully done with it.
00083         return true;
00084     }
00085 
00086     // Handle up and down arrows and escape, if the content is shown.
00087     if (isContentShown())
00088     {
00089         switch (e->key())
00090         {
00091         case Qt::Key_Up:
00092         case Qt::Key_Down:
00093             {
00094                 if (isVisible())
00095                 {
00096                     keyPressEvent(e);
00097                     return true;
00098                 }
00099                 break;
00100             }
00101 
00102         case Qt::Key_Left:
00103         case Qt::Key_Right:
00104         case Qt::Key_Home:
00105         case Qt::Key_End:
00106             {
00107                 cancel();
00108                 return false;
00109             }
00110 
00111         case Qt::Key_A:
00112             {
00113                 if (e->modifiers() == Qt::ControlModifier)
00114                 {
00115                     cancel();
00116                     return false;
00117                 }
00118                 break;
00119             }
00120 
00121         case Qt::Key_Escape:
00122             {
00123                 cancel();
00124                 return true;
00125             }
00126         }
00127     }
00128 
00129     return false;
00130 }
00131 
00132 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 // Function: updateContent()
00134 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 void LineContentAssistWidget::updateAssist(QKeyEvent* e)
00136 {
00137     // Invoke the content assist for certain keys.
00138     if (e == 0 || (e->text().contains(QRegExp("^[a-z|A-z|0-9|_|Ä|ä|Ö|ö|Å|å|(|)|,|&]$")) ||
00139         e->key() == Qt::Key_Backspace || e->key() == Qt::Key_Return ||
00140         e->key() == Qt::Key_Down || e->key() == Qt::Key_Up ||
00141         (m_contentFound && e->text().contains(' '))))
00142     {
00143         updateMatches();
00144     }
00145     // Cancel assisting if needed.
00146     else if (e->modifiers() == Qt::NoModifier)
00147     {
00148         hideAssist();
00149     }
00150 }
00151 
00152 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 // Function: cancel()
00154 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00155 void LineContentAssistWidget::cancel()
00156 {
00157     hideAssist();
00158 }

00163 void LineContentAssistWidget::setMaxVisibleItems(int count)
00164 {
00165     Q_ASSERT(count > 0);
00166     m_maxVisibleItems = count;
00167 }

00169 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 // Function: isContentShown()
00171 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 bool LineContentAssistWidget::isContentShown() const
00173 {
00174     return (isVisible());
00175 }

00186 // Function: mouseDoubleClickEvent()
00187 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00188 void LineContentAssistWidget::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
00189 {
00190     QListWidget::mouseDoubleClickEvent(event);
00191 
00192     // Commit the selection.
00193     commitSelection();
00194 }

00196 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 // Function: updateMatches()
00198 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00199 void LineContentAssistWidget::updateMatches()
00200 {
00201     // Clear the content assist and fill it with new content.
00202     clear();
00203 
00204     QString toolTipText;
00205     int toolTipIndex = -1;
00206     QString text = m_parent->text().left(m_parent->cursorPosition());
00207 
00208     m_contentFound = m_matcher->fillWithContent(text, *this, m_lastAssistStartPos, toolTipText,
00209                                                 toolTipIndex);
00210 
00211     // Check if content was found.
00212     if (m_contentFound)
00213     {
00214         // Fit the widget to the contents and move it accordingly.
00215         fitToContents();
00216         moveClose(m_lastAssistStartPos);
00217 
00218         setCurrentRow(0);
00219         show();
00220     }
00221     else
00222     {
00223         hide();
00224     }
00225 }
00226 
00227 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00228 // Function: moveClose()
00229 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00230 void LineContentAssistWidget::moveClose(int /*cursorPos*/)
00231 {
00232     // Determine the correct upper-left corner position for the widget.
00233     int screenWidth = QApplication::desktop()->width();
00234     int screenHeight = QApplication::desktop()->height();
00235     
00236     // By default, the desired position is below line edit.
00237     QPoint pos = m_parent->mapToGlobal(QPoint(0, 0)) + QPoint(0,  m_parent->height());
00238     
00239     // Restrict x coordinate by the screen width.
00240     pos.setX(std::min(std::max(0, pos.x()), screenWidth - width()));
00241 
00242     // Lift the widget above the line edit only if necessary to keep it fully in view.
00243     if (pos.y() + height() > screenHeight)
00244     {
00245         pos.setY(m_parent->mapToGlobal(m_parent->pos()).y() - height() - 10);
00246     }
00247     
00248     // Move the widget to the final position.
00249     move(pos);
00250 }
00251 
00252 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00253 // Function: canCommitWith()
00254 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255 bool LineContentAssistWidget::canCommitWith(QKeyEvent* e) const
00256 {
00257     return (!e->text().contains(QRegExp("^[a-z|A-z|0-9|_|Ä|ä|Ö|ö|Å|å]$")) &&
00258             e->key() != Qt::Key_Backspace && e->key() != Qt::Key_Escape &&
00259             e->key() != Qt::Key_Up && e->key() != Qt::Key_Down &&
00260             e->key() != Qt::Key_Left && e->key() != Qt::Key_Right &&
00261             e->key() != Qt::Key_Space && e->modifiers() != Qt::ControlModifier);
00262 }
00263 
00264 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00265 // Function: commitSelection()
00266 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00267 void LineContentAssistWidget::commitSelection()
00268 {
00269     Q_ASSERT(m_lastAssistStartPos != -1);
00270 
00271     // Replace the text with the current content.
00272     m_parent->setSelection(m_lastAssistStartPos, m_parent->cursorPosition());
00273     m_parent->insert(currentItem()->text());
00274 
00275     hideAssist();
00276 }
00277 
00278 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00279 // Function: fitToContents()
00280 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00281 void LineContentAssistWidget::fitToContents()
00282 {
00283     if (count() == 0)
00284     {
00285         return;
00286     }
00287 
00288     int visibleRowCount = std::min(count(), m_maxVisibleItems);
00289     int height = visibleRowCount * sizeHintForRow(0) + frameWidth() * 2;
00290     int width = sizeHintForColumn(0) + frameWidth() * 2 + verticalScrollBar()->sizeHint().width();
00291     
00292     setFixedSize(width, height);
00293 }
00294 
00295 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00296 // Function: hideAssist()
00297 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00298 void LineContentAssistWidget::hideAssist()
00299 {
00300     hide();
00301     clear();
00302     m_contentFound = false;
00303 }
